title: Inception
desc: A skilled thief, Dom Cobb, is given a chance to erase his criminal history if he can successfully plant an idea into someone's subconscious.

title: Reeta Sanyal
desc: An independent woman embarks on a journey to discover herself after facing personal struggles.

title: The Dark Knight
desc: Batman faces his greatest enemy, the Joker, who brings chaos and anarchy to Gotham City.

title: Dangal
desc: A father trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers despite societal pressures.

title: Avengers: Endgame
desc: The Avengers assemble one final time to undo Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

title: 3 Idiots
desc: Two friends set out to find their lost college friend while reminiscing about their engineering days.

title: Interstellar
desc: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Kabir Singh
desc: A short-tempered surgeon spirals into self-destruction after his girlfriend is forced to marry someone else.

title: Titanic
desc: A romantic tragedy about the ill-fated Titanic voyage and the love story of Jack and Rose.

title: Bahubali: The Beginning
desc: A young man learns about his royal heritage and his destiny to reclaim his throne.

title: The Matrix
desc: A hacker discovers the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Gangs of Wasseypur
desc: A tale of power, revenge, and crime spanning generations in the coal mafia of Dhanbad.

title: Jurassic Park
desc: A group of visitors must survive an island full of dinosaurs after a catastrophic failure of its security system.

title: Lagaan
desc: A small village challenges British rule through a game of cricket to avoid paying high taxes.

title: The Godfather
desc: The aging patriarch of a powerful crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: PK
desc: An alien stranded on Earth questions religious beliefs and superstitions through his innocent perspective.

title: Fight Club
desc: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
desc: Three friends go on a bachelor road trip across Spain, experiencing life-changing moments.

title: Deadpool
desc: A former special forces operative turned mercenary seeks revenge after an experiment leaves him with healing powers.

title: Chak De! India
desc: A former Indian hockey captain coaches an underdog women's team to glory.

title: The Avengers
desc: Nick Fury assembles a team of superheroes to stop Loki and his army from invading Earth.

title: Andhadhun
desc: A blind pianist's life turns chaotic when he witnesses a murder he wasn't supposed to.

title: Gladiator
desc: A betrayed Roman general seeks vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Gully Boy
desc: A young rapper from Mumbai's streets follows his dream while facing societal struggles.

title: Iron Man
desc: A billionaire genius creates a high-tech suit to fight evil and protect the world.

title: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
desc: A kind-hearted Indian man embarks on a journey to reunite a mute Pakistani girl with her family.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
desc: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange to fix his identity crisis, leading to multiversal chaos.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
desc: A love story where a young man must win over his beloved's conservative family.

title: Doctor Strange
desc: A brilliant neurosurgeon embarks on a mystical journey to become the Sorcerer Supreme.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
desc: A powerful underdog rises to dominate the dangerous world of gold mining in India.
